about_the_game:
Iridio: Prologue offers a brief preview of the full game content and features.

Seized by criminals, the island designated for your research needs your help.
Join Yatziri and the Wazhari tribe to liberate their hostages, explore hidden secrets, craft essential items and weapons, and strategically use fire and water in challenging puzzles and life-or-death battles for survival.

Gameplay features

  • Dive into a fully open-world island, offering boundless exploration opportunities.
  • Dynamic 24-hour day/night cycle and diverse weather conditions such as rain and snow, actively influencing your in-game experience.
  • Employ your versatile crossbow in various modes, including standard, electric, explosive, and flammable options.
  • Harness the island's creatures to perform laborious tasks, taking advantage of their abilities for your benefit.
  • Find essential items, trade them with the tribe, or get them from looting fallen enemies.
  • Gather resources to craft a variety of objects and weapons crucial for your journey.
  • Elements like fire and water can be used to unravel puzzles, liberate hostages, and unveil hidden secrets.
  • Encounter advanced AI that dynamically reacts to your in-game actions, random events, and changing weather conditions.
  • Immerse yourself in realistic physics and graphics, incorporating the latest Unity High Definition Rendering Pipeline (HDRP).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD RX 5600 XT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
